SUB_A00_SYSM_DIVA_BODY_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: UI
SUB_A00_SYSM_DIVA_BODY_000_CUT_000_000.text: You can now use a new type of frame.

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Constantine
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_000.text:
All members of Albion's National Extradimensional
Exploratory Task Force must possess some measure
of combat ability, you know.

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I imagine ye must be something of
a combat expert yerself, then?

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Constantine
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, perish the thought! I am here to act as your
commander, and as such I will do nothing more
than issue orders. All the fighting will be done by
my trusty crew! ...Which includes you, incidentally.

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Ye'd have me fight!? But I haven't got
any kind of combat program installed!

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Constantine
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_040.text:
I had a feeling you might say that, and as such
made arrangements to ensure you'd be able
to experience some basic combat training.
I'm sure you'll get the hang of it before long.

SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Diva_No5
SUB_A00_WRLD_DIVA_BATTLE_000_CUT_000_050.text: ...Will fighting lead me to my heart?
